response.original_title: Knife Party vs Pendulum - Ultra Music Festival 2016
response.overview: Ultra 2016 is officially wrap, and the biggest story out of the weekend is the closing performance from Knife Party / Pendulum on the Main Stage. Before anything is said, the Ultra team deserves major recognition for booking a live drum ‘n’ bass act as the final performance of the entire festival. If you weren’t there to experience Pendulum’s long-anticipated reunion, we’ve got you covered on everything you missed.
response.title: Knife Party vs Pendulum - Ultra Music Festival 2016
